page.title: 08COMMUNITY SERVICES
page.content: {Old peoples homes}are all over Newport,Escholl Court(Lliswerry Road),Longmeadow Court (Broadmead Park). There are many places for the disabled e.g. Curison Court (Aberthaw Rd.), Alway is for the deaf and blind, and the Ladyhill Centre. There are {clubs for the elderly:}the Harry Dunn Club near Magor St.,Archibald St. Old Peoples Centre,and Eton Rd.Day Centre/ {Health Centres, dentists,etc.}are very important to the community. Ringland Health Centre and Dentist is one of many services on Chepstow Rd., Corporation Rd.,Caerleon Rd,Ringland, Bridge St., and Clytha Rd. Community services such as these are a vital part of our lives and are needed constantly by young and old people.
